name: Tenshi In Tower
description:
Tenshi in Tower(天子塔中)，a trial for Tenshi Hinanawi and you! Help her find confidence by filling the color! First work by Team Travel Notes of Girls’ Secret Sealing Club! 

※Based on RPG Maker XP

※After download the game, please install the form in the pack first. 

※Made by Chinese with poor translation, thanks for your understanding! 

Staff:

Producer & Program: 方块五

Art: 极北

Stage Design: 笑颜

Translation: 符筱
